overview: Barsaranya is set in the backdrop of one of India`s richest rain forests situated in the East. The film attempts to portray the natural ambiance of the rain forest, the conflict arising out of man`s greed to gain from the forest in excess of what it has naturally been providing. It follows the story of a dedicated forester who alone stands up to fight the evils of corruption and greed.
title: Borhxaranya
